channel.title: Romhack on PacoChan's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Romhack on PacoChan's Website

item.title: Resident Evil (GameBoy Color)
item.description: Resident Evil for GameBoy Color was cancelled at 90% of development and never released. But thanks to a fundraiser, the one that was holding two builds of this game, released them to the public.

item.title: The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword - Game-Breaking Bug Fix (Wii)
item.description: At a certain point toward the end of the Legend of Zelda Skyward Sword, while collecting pieces of a certain Song, you’re tasked with visiting the Fire, Water and Thunder Dragons in any order you choose.

item.title: Cheetahmen II (NES)
item.description: This game is infamous because it’s one of the worst games ever made. It’s full of all sorts of glitches and it’s extremely hard because of it’s glitched gameplay.
